May 11, 19fel
Dear Bill;
Enclosed is a thermofax copy of Oren Harris1 letter to
Governor DiSalle, DiSalle's request for information on the
subject to Senator Ocasek ( one of the sponsors of our
network bill ), and Ocasek's reply to DiSalle.
If you have already seen this, please pass it along to
David Stewart.
Sincerely,
Richard B. Hull
Executive Director
